channel.title: Culture on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Culture on Maciej Mróz Personal Blog

item.title: It’s time for Culture 2.0
item.description: In the USA, SOPA is dead. Poland (and other countries) might not be so lucky with the ACTA. But let’s assume for a while it goes down, too. It’s a good thing, right? I am not so sure about that. First, I absolutely agree that intellectual property should be enforced. What I don’t like about the law and the agreement mentioned above is who is responsible for the enforcing, and who is held responsible for the breach of intellectual property.
